channel.title: twitch on Paul Czarkowski
channel.description: Recent content in twitch on Paul Czarkowski

item.title: Streaming from Zoom to Twitch (or YouTube)
item.description: Zoom meetings are great for a small number of people, and if you’re willing to buy a Webinar license you can also use it for a full on webinar (although there are some interesting restrictions to webinars, like you can’t have breakout rooms). Twitch is a great streaming platform, originally used for streaming video games, its now more commonly being used to stream live coding and another technology related things that involve sharing your screen.
